medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient woke earlier this morning with severe periumbilical pain, which later shifted to the right lower quadrant. The pain was cramping with no alleviating or exacerbating factors. Denies fever, chills, nausea, or emesis. Pain worsened, prompting hospital presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Excision of left forehead skin lesion as a child; Past medical history: None.
